about_the_game:
Disclaimer: This is a cosmetic DLC. It doesn't influence gameplay and only adds visual changes to the game. It is meant to support the developer in making more games like these.

This DLC unlocks the following features:

  • Your name will be mentioned in the credits of the game as seen on the screenshot.

  • Your Steam Avatar is a painting somewhere in the game.
    It's still a hidden object game, so it's up to you to find it!

Thank you for your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit only
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Disclaimer: this is a cosmetic DLC, there is no extra gameplay. Features: 1. Your name will be mentioned in the credits. 2. Your Steam Avatar is a painting somewhere in the game. *It's still a hidden object game, so it's up to you to find them!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Dutch*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*
